column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Made a reservation and went in for a late supper. The exterior was very welcoming to me when I saw the sign that said BAR. When you enter the doorway
column2: there is a little corridor prior to arriving at the front desk
column3: and I think this was the waiting area for people without reservations. Arrived a little early
column4: so the hostess advised us to wait at the bar. The wait was at most 5 minutes
column5: and we were directed to our table. The stroll to our table made us realize how big this establishment was.
